revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Explosive Charge |image = [[File:ExplosiveCharge.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Explosive Charge''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Cinnabar Island in [[Kanto]] for 5,000 {{Questpoints}}) |effect = Automatically damages tiles upon moving to a new [[Underground]] layer }}
The '''Explosive Charge''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it causes new mining layers in the [[Underground]] to start with damaged tiles. Any tiles it affects have a single layer removed. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cinnabar Island Shop]] in [[Kanto]].
==Detalles== Para este objeto de Oak saltarse capas en el subsuelo cuenta para conseguir progreso para el siguiente nivel.
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || 2 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 10 times || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || 4 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 10 times || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || 7 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 30 times || style="text-align:right" | 400,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || 11 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 50 times || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || 15 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 100 times || style="text-align:right" | 2,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || 20 tiles damaged || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}

revision.text:
{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Explosive Charge |image = [[File:ExplosiveCharge.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Explosive Charge''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Cinnabar Island in [[Kanto]] for 5,000 {{Questpoints}}) |effect = Automatically damages tiles upon moving to a new [[Underground]] layer }}
The '''Explosive Charge''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it causes new mining layers in the [[Underground]] to start with damaged tiles. Any tiles it affects have a single layer removed. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cinnabar Island Shop]] in [[Kanto]].
==Details==
For this Oak Item, skipping layers in the Underground counts as gaining progress toward the next level.
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !! Upgrade Cost |- |0 || 2 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 10 times || style="text-align:right" | 50,000 {{pdollar}} |- |1 || 4 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 10 times || style="text-align:right" | 100,000 {{pdollar}} |- |2 || 7 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 30 times || style="text-align:right" | 400,000 {{pdollar}} |- |3 || 11 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 50 times || style="text-align:right" | 1,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |4 || 15 tiles damaged || Dig deeper 100 times || style="text-align:right" | 2,000,000 {{pdollar}} |- |5/Max || 20 tiles damaged || N/A || style="text-align:right" | N/A |- |}
